R Package - serocalculator

UC Davis SeroEpidemiology Group

Source: vignettes/cover.Rmd
cover.Rmd

R package serocalculator allows translation of antibody levels measured in a (cross-sectional) population sample into an estimate of the frequency with which seroconversions (infections) occur in the sampled population.

Item Data
